text: The 1942 Invercargill mayoral by-election was held on 22 June 1942 to elect the Mayor of Invercargill after the resignation of John Robert Martin due to illness on 26 May. ==Background== Abraham Wachner was elected to council in 1938 and became deputy mayor in 1941. ==Results== The following table gives the election results: ==References== Category:1942 elections in New Zealand Category:Mayoral elections in Invercargill
title: 1942 Invercargill mayoral by-election
